basic_information.scholarship_name: UCO Foundation Board of Trustees Scholarship

description: This scholarship is for current UCO Students who meet the following criteria: Eligibility Requirements Must be a current UCO student Must have a GPA of at least 2.5 Demonstrate financial need This scholarship is available to apply for during the Current UCO Student Application.

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

criteria.description: SIS_Enrolled_Status is Full Time   or SIS_Enrolled_Status is Part Time
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Enrolled_Status is Full Time   or SIS_Enrolled_Status is Part Time
